nodes.text: Lerrimore Droids was a droid manufacturer. They produced the KPR servant droid. The Bounty Hunters' Guild owned stock in Lerrimore Droids, and sold its KPR servant droids at a discount to Guild members. Due to the Guild's stake in the company, it was believed that if Guildmaster Cradossk demanded a meeting with the head of Lerrimore Droids, it would be granted immediately.
